title: Need help identifying a font
content:
Does anyone know which font is this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415114230im_/http:/typophile.com/files/padel_4661.jpg)

Thanks in advance!
author: mariajou

comments.content:
It looks like **[Fontovision](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415114230/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Fontovision%20-%20Regular&fid=252685e56a9b5fe4831c356ea97d1443&fsize=60&text=padel&fit=1)** free font by Dieter Schumacher (1999), probably a bit modified

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415114230/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
